TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void IconPressHandler(object o, IconPressArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed IconPressHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the IconPressHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the IconPressHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the IconPressHandler is removed from the event.
